effect.sun_moon: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
